Package com.citrisoft.zimbra.store.backend

Class HttpClientBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.citrisoft.zimbra.store.backend.Backend
      • com.citrisoft.zimbra.store.backend.HttpClientBackend
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HcpBackendNG, S3BackendNG, ScalityBackend
    public abstract class HttpClientBackend
extends Backend
    Base class for HTTP-based object store backends using a dedicated HttpClient pool It is expected at miminum that implementing classes will override one or more of the following methods: getURI(String locator) configureClient(HttpClientBuilder builder) configureRequest(RequestBuilder builder) executeRequest(HttpUriRequest request)
